actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend chapter 42 of title 38, United States Code, with respect to the definition of disabled veteran.

summary.text: Amends Federal provisions relating to employment and training programs for Vietnam era veterans to redefine the term "disabled veteran" to mean any veteran who has a compensable service-connected disability under laws administered by the Department of Veterans Affairs, or a veteran whose discharge or release from active-duty was for a disability incurred or aggravated in the line of duty.

titles.title: To amend chapter 42 of title 38, United States Code, with respect to the definition of disabled veteran.
